    PuTTY Connect to other computers through SSH on a Windows computer by using this helpful tool.Pyodbc A package that will allow you to connect to databases with Python.Python A tool that will allow you to run programs in the Python programming language which is both intuitive and powerful.1 visitRegExr Learn how to use regular expressions by using a sandbox and viewing documentation.Share Link Generator Generate Google+, Facebook, and Twitter share buttons for whatever you like!Skulpt Run python scripts online in this browser-based tool.Sothink SWF Decompiler Use this paid decompiler to transform SWF files into FLA format.SQL Fiddle Test out your SQL queries using several different versions of SQL.Stack Overflow Browse many programming questions to learn more about programming.Tomcat Run Java programs on the web in the form of servlets with this helpful and free tool. 2 visitsTwitter Developer Access tools to aid you in connecting programs to Twitter and register apps to communicate with Twitter.W3C Markup Validator Validate your HTML code to make sure that it will display well in all browsers.XAMPP Set up a web server on your computer with various features including the ability to have a MySQL database and run PHP code.1 visitYouTube Watch many different videos online and even embed some that you like on your own site.
